original_title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - White Fox Festival
overview: Music and Dance phenomenon BabyMetal performs their fifth show in the Five Fox Festival in Japan. The concert was held at Zepp DiverCity Tokyo on July 26th, 2017. This special fan event required all audience members to wear corpse paint.
tagline: The White Fox Walkers and their immortal spirits who have regained their true formâ€¦
title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - White Fox Festival
